AllProjects.project_heading: Bangla News Scrapper Web Application with self-made Pagination
AllProjects.project_description: This is basically a news scrapper website which provides real time news sometimes after.- This server side of this project made with Python ,Django rest framework, requests, beautiful soup modules- The client side of this project made with pure html5, css3 and javascript es6.- I have implemented pagination feature in this project through which we can navigate every news in the form of seperate pages.
